des: "A simple side dish with bold flavor.  I made a huge tray for a friend's fancy party and it was gone in no time.  Everyone asked me for the recipe, but I had made it up! Serve with your favorite Chinese food."
ins: Place the baby carrots, orange juice concentrate, tamari sauce, garlic, ginger, orange zest, toasted sesame oil, and honey into a slow cooker, and mix well. Set the cooker to Low, cover, and cook for 8 hours. Turn setting to High, and cook for 30 minutes.
